ArgonTest.Name: Type test (class)
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Ar._
open class A <: Object
public new() end
end class B <: A
public new() initialize _ = A.new() end
public proc _.printMessage(): Unit = puts 'Found B' end class C <: A
public new() initialize _ = A.new() end
end
proc main(): Unit do val a: A = B.new() match a case val b: B = b.printMessage() end end
